## Setup

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
avg_temp <- read_csv(here::here("data", "avg_temp.csv"))
avg_sal <- read_csv(here::here("data", "avg_sal.csv"))
```

## Plot time series

```{r}
# Temperature
ggplot(avg_temp) +
  geom_point(aes(x = Year, y = Avg_Temp))
```

```{r}
# Salinity
ggplot(avg_sal) +
  geom_point(aes(x = Year, y = Avg_Salinity))
```
